Dom Cobb.Action: Shows up injured, delirious but determined, indicating resilience and focus despite physical and mental stress.
Does not immediately react to threatening situation (handgun placed in front of him) with panic, suggesting calmness and control under pressure.
Explains the concept of ideas as highly resilient and contagious with clarity and confidence during a pitch to Saito.
Uses metaphor and scientific analogies effectively to communicate complex ideas clearly.
Takes the lead in the conversation confidently, showing command of the subject matter.
Explains to Saito how he can train his subconscious to defend itself, demonstrating confidence and willingness to help.
Requires complete openness from Saito, asking to know his thoughts better than anyone else, including his wife and analyst.
Confidently explains to Saito that he is the most skilled extractor and can train Saito's subconscious to defend itself from skilled extractors.
Demands full openness from Saito to successfully navigate his thoughts, demonstrating awareness of the complexity of the task and the need for trust and precision.
Maintains composure and silence despite Arthur's worry when Saito appears to realize their plan, showing control under pressure.
Maintains control and steady footing on unstable rooftop during tremor, confidently assesses information security situation.
Relies on others (Arthur, Nash, Saito) while asleep connected with tubes, potentially limiting immediate independent action.
Tells Arthur to just get to his room and says he'll take care of the rest, indicating a protective and responsible attitude.
Expresses that he is missing Mal but also states he can't trust her anymore, showing emotional honesty and conflict.
Kneels at Mal's feet and ties the chair legs with a black rope, showing carefulness and perhaps concern to keep her safe or restrained.
Touches Mal's ankle lightly, showing tenderness and emotional connection despite difficulty.
Lets Mal look away uncomfortable and moves away to the window, respecting her space despite tension.
Tosses the rope out and tests it, implying a methodical approach and possibly an underlying anxiety.

Rappels down a castle wall, uses a glass cutter skillfully, moves silently through a kitchen, uses a silenced pistol effectively, takes down a guard with precision, removes a painting revealing a safe, opens the safe, and retrieves an envelope with practiced hands.
Freezes when lights come on and someone unexpected appears with a gun, showing hesitation or being caught off guard.
Places his gun down slowly and slides it halfway across the table, signaling a non-aggressive posture despite high tension.
Shoots Arthur between the eyes to save him from further pain inflicted by Mal, showing a willingness to act decisively to protect an ally.
Questions whether Mal informed others or if they have known about the infiltration, indicating openness and a desire for honesty.
Raises hands after sliding the envelope, showing non-threatening and cooperative body language.
Does not react aggressively to Mal's actions initially, showing measured restraint under provocation.
Slides his gun halfway along the table, maintaining calm and measured behavior despite the tense situation.
Questions Saito by asking if the threat was known all along, showing awareness and strategic thinking.
Acknowledges that threatening someone in a dream has no point if it causes them to wake up, demonstrating his understanding of dream mechanics.
Springs into action to shoot Arthur between the eyes to stop Mal from causing further harm, showing decisiveness and ability under pressure.
Does not attempt to negotiate or de-escalate Mal's aggression before using lethal force.
Grabs his gun and shoots Arthur between the eyes to apparently protect the mission, showing readiness to sacrifice even close associates.
Springs for the table, grabs his gun, shoots Arthur between the eyes confidently during chaotic situation.
Runs up the stairs pulling out the second envelope while reading typewritten sheets during intense environment upheaval.
Lurches towards the stairs as the building buckles and heaves, showing persistence and focus amid danger.
Gets smashed sideways off his feet during confrontation.
Quickly picks himself up at full speed despite danger, scrambles to read a crucial document under fire.
Appears confused and puzzled when reading the last sheet of paper during a high-pressure moment.
Survives being swamped and spun by water, showing physical resilience and capacity to regain composure quickly.
Is smacked and pushed backward, seemingly losing some control momentarily.
Launches himself at Saito, knocking him down and disarming him, then interrogates him firmly but without cruelty.
Makes a pointed, somewhat sarcastic comment about Saito's secret affair, suggesting awareness and judgment of moral failings.
Raises Saito's chin with the barrel of the gun to make him face him when questioning, showing controlled but commanding behavior.
Focuses on the mission and truth, persistent without resorting to unnecessary violence or insults.
Reacts quickly and physically disarms Saito with speed and force, despite being caught off guard and wet.
Maintains composure after the struggle, calmly handling Saito's gun and continuing interrogation.
Uses insight and deduction to identify Saito's hidden secret and the true nature of the encounter.
Challenges Saito confidently, exposing withheld information and questioning motives effectively.
Ignores external threats such as the escalating riot noises outside, focusing intently on the task.
Does not appear hesitant or confused despite raising stakes and increased pressure.
Threatens Saito by putting a gun to his head, seemingly ready to pull the trigger.
Successfully extracts all information from Saito's mind despite deception, showing skill and persistence.

Demonstrates the ability to manipulate dream layers and maintain calm under pressure, impressing Saito with a dream within a dream.
Lowering his gun and appearing defeated as rioters bang on the door, suggesting a moment of vulnerability or loss of control.

Handing Todashi a thick roll of cash as payment.
Shows impatience and avoids confrontation by leaving train early and saying 'Every man for himself.'

Removes Saito's restraints quickly and decisively allowing for escape efforts, demonstrating practical skill and prompt action under pressure.

Attempts to picture and connect with his children during the call, showing emotional attachment.

Checks his watch, loads his handgun, places it within reach, and focuses intensely on the spinning top as a reality check.

Appears restless and tense before the call, indicating inner turmoil impacting his focus.
Considers smashing the phone in frustration at a powerless moment but restrains himself.
Responds to his son's questions gently but firmly, explaining difficult truths.
Stares at the dead phone and downs his drink after call ends, showing internal struggle but no outward emotional breakdown.

Shows urgency and focus on mission despite personal distress, prioritizing task over emotional expression.

Engages politely and calmly with Saito, showing composure and restraint.

Despite careful consideration, ultimately takes a 'leap of faith' with minimal assurance, risking high stakes based on intuition.
